thread.title: Jose Mourinho set to be offered new deal as Manchester United look to extend Special One's Old Trafford stay
thread.title_full: Jose Mourinho set to be offered new deal as Manchester United look to extend Special One's Old Trafford stay

author: Simon Mullock
title: Jose Mourinho set to be offered new deal as Manchester United look to extend Special One's Old Trafford stay
text:
Sport Jose Mourinho set to be offered new deal as Manchester United look to extend Special One's Old Trafford stay United are planning to open talks at the end of the season with the former Porto, Chelsea, Inter Milan and Real Madrid boss Share Ed Woodward wants to give Jose Mourinho a new deal (Photo: AFP/Getty)   
Manchester United want to hand Jose Mourinho a new contract. 
United are planning to open talks at the end of the season with the former Porto, Chelsea, Inter Milan and Real Madrid boss. 
The club want to extend the three-year deal he signed last year. 
And it is understood that executive vice-chairman Ed Woodward and the clubâ€™s American owners will make Mourinho an offer even if he fails to deliver Champions League football. 
And Mourinho has already made it clear to club bosses that he would accept their invitation to commit his future to the Old Trafford. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
